extension.valueMarkdown: This is an care experience preference example for the *Care Experience Profile*.  It is based on the *US Core Simple Observation Profile*.

text.div:
Generated Narrative: Observation

Resource Observation "care-experience-preference"

Profile: US Core Care Experience Preference Profile

status: final

category: Care Experience Preference (US Core Category#care-experience-preference "Care experience preference")

code: Care Experience Preference (LOINC#95541-9 "Care experience preference")

subject: http://www.hl7.org/fhir/us/core/Patient/example: Amy Shaw

effective: 2023-08-30

value: Here are some examples of the things that I would like to have near me, music that I’d like to hear, and other details of my care that would help to keep me happy and relaxed: Like Bach, especially the cantatas. St. Martin in the Fields

derivedFrom: http://example.org/fhir/DocumentReference/source_document: Patient's hand written document (e.g., letter, note) or form technically a DocumentReference of an image of the document

valueString: Here are some examples of the things that I would like to have near me, music that I’d like to hear, and other details of my care that would help to keep me happy and relaxed: Like Bach, especially the cantatas.  St. Martin in the Fields
